description: PRC-112G Spare Equipment procurement for 50 x Antenna EA, CFSD Montreal and 75 x Antenna EA, CFSD Edmonton. Also, 60 x Battery Non Rechargable, CFSD Montreal, and 400 x Battery Non Rechargable, CFSD Edmonton, and 105 x Battery, Storage FU. Required delivery window for February 28, 2023, with possible use of epost Connect service for electronic submission

full_summary: ## PRC-112G Spare Equipment Solicitation Notice ### Solicitation Reference Number # PW-23-01029382 ### Amendment Number # 1 ### Solicitation Number # W8485-237344/A ### Publication Date # 08 March 2023 ### Closing Date and Time ## 03 May 2023 at 14:00:00 ### Amendment Date # 20 April 2023 ### Purpose The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of spare equipment for the PRC-112G radio system. ### Scope The procured items include: * 50 Unit(s) of Antenna (Item 1: NSN 01-509-6991, Part No. 01-P46710J001, NCAGE 1VPW8) to be delivered to CFSD Montreal * 75 Unit(s) of Antenna (Item 2: NSN 01-509-6991, Part No. 01-P46710J001, NCAGE 1VPW8) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton * 60 Unit(s) of Non-Rechargeable Battery (Item 3: NSN 01-527-9592, Part No. 1794AS0953E/U, NCAGE 4U927) to be delivered to CFSD Montreal * 400 Unit(s) of Non-Rechargeable Battery (Item 4: NSN 01-527-9592, Part No. 1794AS0953E/U, NCAGE 4U927) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton * 105 Unit(s) of Storage Battery (Item 5: NSN 01-622-5675, Part No. MAI-150745, NCAGE 4U927) to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton ### Tender Instructions Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. ### Contact Information Debbie Bergeron, Procurement Specialist Email: [dbergeron@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dbergeron@forces.gc.ca) Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada ### Trade Agreements The bid is open to all qualified suppliers who meet the eligibility criteria.
